title: Conspiracy Theories and Fake News - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 4/14/17
itunes:title: Conspiracy Theories and Fake News - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 4/14/17
description:
Guest host Jimmy Church and guest Brad Olsen discuss the history of conspiracy theories created by the US government to cover up facts about UFOs, terrorism and deceive the American people.
